Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Add Construction PM application with hero section, navigation, and project management

This commit sets up a complete construction project management web application built with Astro, SolidJS, and Tailwind CSS v4.

Features added:
- Hero section with gradient background, CTA buttons, and statistics
- Global navigation menu with links to Dashboard, Projects, Tasks, and Reports
- Project listing page with search and filter capabilities
- Add new project form with validation and success confirmation
- Responsive layout with Tailwind CSS styling
- SolidJS components for interactive functionality
